original_text: But I am happy that I was not there with him. I am happy about that because it will help you. Now you will believe in me. We must go to him now.’
korean_text: 내가 거기 있지 아니한 것을 너희를 위하여 기뻐하노니 이는 너희로 믿게 하려 함이라 그러나 그에게로 가자 하시니

sentences.original_text: that I was not there with him
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그와 함께 그곳에 없었던 것을
왜냐하면 그것이 당신을 도울 것이기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: Now you will believe in me
We must go to him now
